summary: The victim, Parbati Sahani, told police that her husband, Bijay Kumar, beat her for not preparing dinner on time and imprisoned her, giving her very little to eat and drink. Parbati was rescued on Monday after her mother reported the incident to police after learning about the incident from her daughter’s neighbour. When police opened the door to the room where Parbati was being held by her husband, she was found lying unconscious on her own faeces and urine. Parbati said that her husband and her in-laws started abusing her within a few days after the marriage for not bringing sufficient dowry.
title: man-beats-wife-locks-her-for-20-days
